Tanya Cita-cita Anak SD, Sri Mulyani: Mereka Ingin Jadi YouTuber
04 Nov 2019, 07:38 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati/Foto: Eduardo Simorangkir/detikcom

Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengaku cukup kaget saat bertanya mengenai cita-cita para murid SDN 01 Kenari yang disambanginya hari ini. Sri Mulyani mengaku para murid kelas VI tersebut lebih memilih menjadi seorang YouTuber dibanding menjadi menteri. "Apakah ada yang mau jadi Dirjen Pajak? Ada yang nggak mau, mereka menolak, jadi Menkeu, nggak mau, mereka menolak," kata Sri Mulyani di Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019)."Mereka ingin jadi YouTuber, atlet internasional, pilot, pengusaha," jelasnya.Namun demikian, Sri Mulyani memahami hal tersebut. Dia bilang negara akan senantiasa mendukung setiap cita-cita yang mereka inginkan."Fungsi itu penting dan itu dibutuhkan oleh kita semua dan mereka hargai itu. Dengan role playing, mereka memahami bahwa ternyata untuk mengurus Indonesia harus bersama-sama," ungkapnya.Adapun kedatangan Sri Mulyani ke SDN 01 Kenari hari ini dilakukan dalam rangka program Kemenkeu Mengajar. Program ini diharapkan dapat mengenalkan sedini mungkin bagaimana peran Kemenkeu dalam upaya menjaga ekonomi negeri dan mengenalkan profesi yang ada di Kementerian Keuangan. "Ini adalah tujuan untuk mengenalkan kepada anak-anak pada usia sekolah dasar pada saat mereka masih di dalam mengenali fungsi-fungsi keuangan negara secara mudah juga bagaimana kita menjelaskan mengenai bagaimana mengurus keuangan negara dengan baik." kata Sri Mulyani. Asking the ideals of elementary school children, Sri Mulyani: They Want to Become YouTubers
Nov 04 2019, 07:38 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati / Photo: Eduardo Simorangkir / detikcom

Jakarta - Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati admitted that she was quite surprised when she asked about the ideals of the SDN 01 Kenari students she was referring to today. Sri Mulyani admitted that grade VI students preferred to become a YouTuber rather than becoming a minister. "Does anyone want to be the Director General of Taxes? Some don't want to, they refuse, so the Minister of Finance, they don't want to, they refuse," Sri Mulyani said in Jakarta on Monday (11/04/2019). "They want to be YouTubers, international athletes "Pilot, businessman," he explained. However, Sri Mulyani understood that. He said the country would always support every goal they wanted. "The function is important and it is needed by all of us and they appreciate it. With role playing, they understand that it turns out that to take care of Indonesia must be together," he said. Sri Mulyani went to SDN 01, Walnuts today, carried out within the framework of the Ministry of Finance's Teaching program. The program is expected to be able to introduce as early as possible how the Ministry of Finance's role in efforts to maintain the country's economy and introduce the profession that is in the Ministry of Finance. "This is a goal to introduce children to primary school-age children while they are still in recognizing the functions of state finances easily as well as how we explain how to properly manage state finances." said Sri Mulyani.
